name: Autotroph #4
description:
→  The 'Autotrophs' were a series of prints created with a bespoke software simulating the process of analogue video feedback. The video signal self-replicates to create geometric tessellations. Originally exhibited at Artware 5, The North American Cultural Institute, Lima, Peru in 2010 (Re-rendered in 2021)

→ Edition of 3
